lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: What is the writer's carpet made of?
lyrics.translation: 作家的地毯是由什么制成的？

lyrics.text: We have just moved into a new house and I have been working hard all morning.
lyrics.translation: 我们刚刚搬进一个新房子，我整个上午都在努力工作。

lyrics.text: I have been trying to get my new room in order.
lyrics.translation: 我一直在努力整理我的新房间。

lyrics.text: This has not been easy because I own over a thousand books.
lyrics.translation: 这并不容易，因为我拥有超过一千本书。

lyrics.text: To make matters worse, the room is rather small, so I have temporarily put my books on the floor.
lyrics.translation: 更糟糕的是，房间相当小，所以我暂时把书放在了地板上。

lyrics.text: At the moment they cover every inch of floor space and I actually have to walk on them to get in or out of the room.
lyrics.translation: 目前，它们覆盖了地板的每一寸空间，我实际上不得不踩着它们进出房间。

lyrics.text: A short while ago my sister helped me to carry one of my old bookcases up the stairs.
lyrics.translation: 不久前，我妹妹帮我把一个旧书架搬上了楼。

lyrics.text: She went into my room and got a big surprise when she saw all those books on the floor.
lyrics.translation: 她走进我的房间，当她看到地板上所有的书时，大吃一惊。

lyrics.text: This is the prettiest carpet I have ever seen, she said.
lyrics.translation: 这是我见过的最漂亮的地毯，她说。

lyrics.text: She gave that for some time and then added, you don't need bookcases at all.
lyrics.translation: 她给了那个一段时间，然后补充说，你根本不需要书柜。

lyrics.text: You can sit here in your spare time and read the carpet.
lyrics.translation: 你可以在空闲时间坐在这里读地毯。
